message.raw:
Added Zaberstage stuff (in beta)
Modified output classes so that it saves the state of the widgets in the settings dictionary so that continuity is maintained when restarting a device
Doesn't seem to work for digital channels yet. Will work on it later!

Modified the camera so that it checks connectivity when you hit enter after changing the host name, and maintains continuity when restarting the tab
